text: A plug-organization is a social organization. More than 100 plug-organizations are in Bavaria. The members always have to carry a plug. Whenever one members sees another member, they check that the other member has a plug. If the other member does not have a plug, they have to give some money to the plug- organization. The plug-organization uses this money to purchase beer for the next meeting. == References == Category:Bavaria Category:Beer-related culture Category:Cultural organizations Category:Non-profit organizations of Europe
title: Plug-organization
